text: [Music]
hi my name is chloe weaver and today i
will discuss the upgrade and renewal
process for hourly ami and sas
subscriptions
i will cover upgrade and renewal
scenarios walk through the seller
process of creating the hourly upgrader
renewal
and walk through the buyer process of
subscribing to the upgrade or renewal
offer
first let's look at some common upgrade
and renewal scenarios
a private offer upgrade or renewal is
needed when the buyer needs something
different than what they are currently
subscribed to in aws marketplace
there are four reasons to facilitate a
buyer upgrade or renewal for an hourly
subscription
first a buyer may require an upgrade or
renewal when they would like new or
different terms than their current terms
next a buyer may want a different price
for each dimension or instance type that
they are subscribed to
the buyer would like a new or different
duration
or the buyer would like to renew their
contract before the existing contract
ends
next we'll look at how to upgrade or
renew an hourly subscription
to upgrade an ami or sas hourly private
offer a new private offer needs to be
created by the seller
new offers are created by navigating to
the offers tab in the aws marketplace
management portal or ammp
once the offer has been created the
customer will subscribe to it
check out the private offers overview
video linked below for detailed
instructions on how private offers are
created
how do i subscribe to an upgraded or
renewed hourly subscription
first the buyer needs to sign into the
aws account they want to use to
subscribe to the renewed or upgraded ami
or sas private offer which they can do
in one of two ways
they can either open the private offer
url that was sent by the seller or
navigate to the aws marketplace product
page for the product in which they are
subscribing to
then they'll select the private offer
from the drop down menu titled offer
name
the customer will then review pricing
for all available dimensions and choose
subscribe
next the buyer will click accept terms
they will then see a message confirming
they've been subscribed
if subscribing to an ami hourly product
any additional linked accounts that need
to utilize the private offer must also
complete the subscription process
if subscribing to a sas product the
customer will proceed to the seller's
website to complete registration after
finalizing the subscription in aws
marketplace
note a buyer does not need to cancel
their previous hourly subscription in
order to subscribe to the new offer and
when they subscribe to the new private
offer it will completely replace their
previous subscription
thank you
if you have any further questions about
subscribing to ami hourly or sas
subscription private offers please reach
out to mpcusdesk amazon.com
